In a terminal type man fsck and hit en: when i typed fsck /dev/sda1 this error appeared: fsck.ext2: Permission denied while trying to open /dev/sda1 You must have r/w access to the filesystem or be root
As you probably have already noticed, it will require admin priviledges
Do *not* run fsck on a mounted partition.
Are you running the liveCD? If not, wait until you are.
If the partition is unmounted you do not need the CD.
